trans-unit.source: 160505: SNN News Publications cannot have addables settings. It should, being News Publications inherit from Publications.
trans-unit.target: 160505:SNN新闻刊物不能有可添加的设置。应该是的,因为新闻出版物继承自出版物。

trans-unit.source: 176581: removed Category Filter preview tab, and registered a “dummy” public view for this content type
trans-unit.target: 176581: removed Category Filter preview tab, and registered a “dummy” public view for this content type

trans-unit.source: Add ajax calendar view with json rest web service.
trans-unit.target: 用json rest web服务添加ajax日历视图。

trans-unit.source: Add catalog index able to index multiple ranges for one object in order to store datetime ranges with recurrence.
trans-unit.target: 增加了目录索引,可以对一个对象的多个范围进行索引,以便存储具有递归性的日期时间范围。

trans-unit.source: Add support for recurrence in events and form widgets to set it.
trans-unit.target: 在事件中增加对递归的支持,并对表单小部件进行设置。

trans-unit.source: Add timezone support for viewers.
trans-unit.target: 为浏览者增加时区支持。

trans-unit.source: Added ‘unblock’ css class to viewer field iterators so links render properly (resulting from removal of the sortable id/class)
trans-unit.target: Added ‘unblock’ css class to viewer field iterators so links render properly (resulting from removal of the sortable id/class)

trans-unit.source: Added a SilvaNewsCategoryFilter asset, which can be used to limit the category lists in Filters and the properties tool in the News Item editor.
trans-unit.target: 添加了SilvaNewsCategoryFilter资产,它可以用来限制Filters和News Item编辑器中的属性工具中的类别列表。

trans-unit.source: Added a couple of new fields to service_news to allow displaying dates and months in a certain locale and format (this is a global setting rather than a per-user one, because Silva content currently can not be presented in more than one language it doesn’t make sense to display dates and months in different languages).
trans-unit.target: Added a couple of new fields to service_news to allow displaying dates and months in a certain locale and format (this is a global setting rather than a per-user one, because Silva content currently can not be presented in more than one language it doesn’t make sense to display dates and months in different languages).

trans-unit.source: Added a dummy upgrader for SNN 2.7, so it appears that the upgrade upgrades to 2.7
trans-unit.target: 增加了一个SNN 2.7的虚拟升级器,所以看起来升级到2.7了。

trans-unit.source: Added a new checkbox in Agenda Items, ‘display time’, to control whether the time part of start and end date/time is displayed in the public views, allowing times of 00:00 to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Added a new checkbox in Agenda Items, ‘display time’, to control whether the time part of start and end date/time is displayed in the public views, allowing times of 00:00 to be displayed.

trans-unit.source: Added a new field ‘display_datetime’ to news items, rather than using the publication date/time to determine if and where an item is displayed in a news viewer, this display date is used, e.g. allowing re-publishing of an item without moving it in the public view of news viewers.
trans-unit.target: Added a new field ‘display_datetime’ to news items, rather than using the publication date/time to determine if and where an item is displayed in a news viewer, this display date is used, e.g. allowing re-publishing of an item without moving it in the public view of news viewers.

trans-unit.source: Added dummy upgrader for 1.2, which makes that the upgrades are actually ran when the data version is 1.2 (works around a bug in Silva’s upgrade registry).
trans-unit.target: Added dummy upgrader for 1.2, which makes that the upgrades are actually ran when the data version is 1.2 (works around a bug in Silva’s upgrade registry).

trans-unit.source: Added metadata columns for frequently accessed newsitem data (including get_intro!)
trans-unit.target: 为经常访问的新闻项目数据添加了元数据列(包括get_intro!

trans-unit.source: Added missing upgraders for 1.3 (or below) to 2.0.
trans-unit.target: 增加了1.3(或以下)到2.0的缺失升级器。

trans-unit.source: Added rss.xml and atom.xml views, based on the Silva 2.0 rss.xml Container view. These use the framework laid out for container rss, and include extra tags for silvanews specific metadata (location, start,end dates)
trans-unit.target: 基于Silva 2.0 rss.xml容器视图,添加了rss.xml和atom.xml视图。这些视图使用了容器rss的框架,并包含了额外的标签,用于silvanews特定的元数据(位置,开始,结束日期)。

trans-unit.source: Added upgrader for a specific Zope 2.8.x issue, where some ZCatalog indexes had a new attribute defined, but the upgrader for that attribute wasn’t executed when required.
trans-unit.target: Added upgrader for a specific Zope 2.8.x issue, where some ZCatalog indexes had a new attribute defined, but the upgrader for that attribute wasn’t executed when required.
Agenda items are now displayed according to the end datetime, if available, so that an item disappears from the list of ‘current events’ when it ends rather than when it starts.

trans-unit.source: Agenda viewers know have settings for timezone and first week of the day.
trans-unit.target: 议程查看器知道有时区和每日第一周的设置。

trans-unit.source: AgendaItems spanning over a period of more than one month are now displayed the whole period rather than only the last month
trans-unit.target: 跨越一个多月的议程项目现在可以显示整个期间,而不是只显示上个月。

trans-unit.source: AgendaViewers were pulling the latest number of items, rather than all items in X days.
trans-unit.target: AgendaViewers提取的是最新的项目数,而不是X天内的所有项目。

trans-unit.source: Article and agenda views are now rendered using XSLT.
trans-unit.target: 文章和议程视图现在使用XSLT渲染。

trans-unit.source: Bugs Fixed
trans-unit.target: 错误修正

trans-unit.source: Bugs fixed
trans-unit.target: 错误修复

trans-unit.source: Calendar views for agenda viewers.
trans-unit.target: 议程查看者的日历视图。

trans-unit.source: ChangeLog
trans-unit.target: 变更日志

trans-unit.source: Changed the names of indexes so they’re less likely to clash with names of user-generated objects - SEE UPGRADE.txt!
trans-unit.target: Changed the names of indexes so they’re less likely to clash with names of user-generated objects - SEE UPGRADE.txt!

trans-unit.source: Changed the new version button in the editor screen from an input to a button, to avoid css conflicts with frontend.css controls styles
trans-unit.target: 将编辑器界面中的新版按钮由输入改为按钮,避免与frontend.css控件样式的css冲突。

trans-unit.source: Code repository
trans-unit.target: 代码库

trans-unit.source: Compatibility fixes for Zope 2.12 and Python 2.6.
trans-unit.target: 对Zope 2.12和Python 2.6进行了兼容性修复。

trans-unit.source: Export of agenda viewers and agenda items to the iCalendar format.
trans-unit.target: 将议程查看器和议程项目导出为iCalendar格式。

trans-unit.source: Features
trans-unit.target: 特点

trans-unit.source: Features added
trans-unit.target: 新增功能

trans-unit.source: First release for Silva 2.2, no longer backwards compatible with prior Silva releases
trans-unit.target: Silva 2.2的第一个版本,不再向后兼容之前的Silva版本。

trans-unit.source: Fix archive view and remove old style view.
trans-unit.target: 修复存档视图,删除旧式视图。

trans-unit.source: Fix rss and atom feeds to use Silva API.
trans-unit.target: 修正rss和atom feeds以使用Silva API。

trans-unit.source: Fixed ‘select all’ in edit tabs.
trans-unit.target: Fixed ‘select all’ in edit tabs.

trans-unit.source: Fixed Kupu ExternalSources support in news items. Thanks to Andrew Altepeter.
trans-unit.target: 修正了新闻项目中对Kupu ExternalSources的支持。感谢 Andrew Altepeter。

trans-unit.source: Fixed broken rss image
trans-unit.target: 修复了破损的rss图片

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug where upgrader was registered for the wrong meta type. Thanks to Marc Petitmermet.
trans-unit.target: 修正了升级器注册错误元类型的错误。感谢 Marc Petitmermet。

trans-unit.source: Fixed i18n support
trans-unit.target: 修正了i18n支持

trans-unit.source: Fixed issue that made that broken images in news items resulted in failing searches.
trans-unit.target: 修正了新闻项目中的破损图片导致搜索失败的问题。

trans-unit.source: Fixed just about all Silva 0.9.3 conversion issues.
trans-unit.target: 修正了所有Silva 0.9.3的转换问题。

trans-unit.source: Fixed memory leakage in the Inline News Viewer
trans-unit.target: 修正了内联新闻查看器的内存泄漏问题

trans-unit.source: Fixed some documentation issues: some version numbers were wrong.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一些文档问题:一些版本号是错误的。

trans-unit.source: Fixed some query variable names in the AgendaFilter
trans-unit.target: 修正了AgendaFilter中的一些查询变量名。

trans-unit.source: Fixed some small template issues so it works correctly with Silva 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一些小的模板问题,使其能与Silva 1.0正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Fixed space above kupu
trans-unit.target: kupu上方的固定空间

trans-unit.source: Fixed space above kupu more robustly, so other extensions can control the feedback space too.
trans-unit.target: 固定空间上面kupu更强大,所以其他扩展也可以控制反馈空间。

trans-unit.source: Fixed support for code sources (external sources) in news items.
trans-unit.target: 修正了新闻项目中对代码来源(外部来源)的支持。

trans-unit.source: Fixes timezone support.
trans-unit.target: 修复了时区支持。

trans-unit.source: Improve tests.
trans-unit.target: 改进测试。

trans-unit.source: Improved (simplified the css of) the properties toolbox layout
trans-unit.target: 改进了(简化了)属性工具箱布局的css。

trans-unit.source: In each item in a news viewer, the first image of the item’s content (if available) is displayed as a thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: In each item in a news viewer, the first image of the item’s content (if available) is displayed as a thumbnail.

trans-unit.source: In the news filter the select all button aligns left
trans-unit.target: 在新闻筛选器中,选择全部按钮向左对齐。

trans-unit.source: InlineNewsViewer was updated with some Z3 features, e.g. using the Z3 interface lookup.
trans-unit.target: InlineNewsViewer更新了一些Z3功能,例如使用Z3接口查找。

trans-unit.source: Kupu editor support for news items (replacing the widget editor)
trans-unit.target: Kupu编辑器支持新闻项目(取代小部件编辑器)。

trans-unit.source: Made SilvaNews work with Silva 2.0/Zope 2.10.
trans-unit.target: 使SilvaNews与Silva 2.0/Zope 2.10一起工作。

trans-unit.source: Made layout of the INV (Inline News Viewer) more generic using standard Silva html classes
trans-unit.target: 使用标准的Silva html类,使INV(Inline News Viewer)的布局更加通用。

trans-unit.source: Make viewers usable as index of news publications.
trans-unit.target: 使浏览者可以作为新闻出版物的索引使用。

trans-unit.source: Moved the “new version” button in the editor screen below the feedback text, as opposed to nestled in the corner next to the text. This because a Silva trainer reported that a trainee couldn’t figure out how to make a new version. Now it’s more obvious, hopefully enough.
trans-unit.target: Moved the “new version” button in the editor screen below the feedback text, as opposed to nestled in the corner next to the text. This because a Silva trainer reported that a trainee couldn’t figure out how to make a new version. Now it’s more obvious, hopefully enough.

trans-unit.source: Name change from SilvaNews to SilvaNewsNetwork
trans-unit.target: 从 "SilvaNews "更名为 "SilvaNewsNetwork"。

trans-unit.source: New Features
trans-unit.target: 新功能

trans-unit.source: New Features ported from SNN 2.7.6
trans-unit.target: 新功能从SNN 2.7.6移植而来。

trans-unit.source: News and Agenda Viewers now have a “Year Range” property which controls the number of years in the past and future wich are displayed in the archive. Attempts to access years outside of this range will raise 404’s.
trans-unit.target: News and Agenda Viewers now have a “Year Range” property which controls the number of years in the past and future wich are displayed in the archive. Attempts to access years outside of this range will raise 404’s.

trans-unit.source: News extension for Silva 2.x.
trans-unit.target: Silva 2.x的新闻扩展。

trans-unit.source: News items are now displayed traversing viewers, this will fix breadcrumbs that used to display items path from there physical location.
trans-unit.target: 现在,新闻项目会穿越浏览者显示,这将修复过去从物理位置显示项目路径的面包屑。

trans-unit.source: Note: SilvaNews 0.9 is incompatible with previously released versions.
trans-unit.target: 注:SilvaNews 0.9与之前发布的版本不兼容。

trans-unit.source: Problem in some DateTime argument formatting solved that made viewing
trans-unit.target: 解决了一些DateTime参数格式化中的问题,使得查看

trans-unit.source: Publishing using the “publish now” button on the edit tab for news items was slightly broken. The resultant page returned after this action had a <base> tag set to the news item version instead of the news item itself, breaking navigation links.
trans-unit.target: Publishing using the “publish now” button on the edit tab for news items was slightly broken. The resultant page returned after this action had a <base> tag set to the news item version instead of the news item itself, breaking navigation links.

trans-unit.source: RSS 1.0 overviews on NewsViewers and Aggregators. By adding /rss to the URL of a NewsViews, one will get the RSS 1.0 feed for this viewer or aggregator.
trans-unit.target: RSS 1.0对NewsViewers和聚合器的概述。通过在NewsViews的URL中添加/rss,就可以获得该浏览器或聚合器的RSS 1.0源。

trans-unit.source: RSS Aggregator public view: removed hard coded table and replaced with standard Silva html rendering
trans-unit.target: RSS聚合器公共视图:删除了硬编码的表格,用标准的Silva html渲染代替。

trans-unit.source: Rather than displaying the first subheader encountered in the news item and the first paragraph encountered (which enforced a certain structure on news item content to make the viewers display the items correctly) news viewers now display the first bit of the news item, regardless of the type of elements that contains. Note that this requires some changes in the public templates (the subheader() and lead() methods have been replaced by one called ‘get_intro’).
trans-unit.target: Rather than displaying the first subheader encountered in the news item and the first paragraph encountered (which enforced a certain structure on news item content to make the viewers display the items correctly) news viewers now display the first bit of the news item, regardless of the type of elements that contains. Note that this requires some changes in the public templates (the subheader() and lead() methods have been replaced by one called ‘get_intro’).

trans-unit.source: Refactor source / filter / viewer relations to use references. Now they can be moved around without loosing relashionships.
trans-unit.target: 重构源/过滤器/浏览者的关系以使用参考。现在他们可以在不失去关系的情况下移动。

trans-unit.source: Refactored News/Agenda viewers:
trans-unit.target: 重构的新闻/议程浏览者。

trans-unit.source: Remove all edition code. This contains only upgraders to
trans-unit.target: 删除所有版本代码。这只包含升级到

trans-unit.source: Removed XMLBuffer, as it is no longer used
trans-unit.target: 删除了XMLBuffer,因为它已不再使用。

trans-unit.source: Removed all tables from the public views to more easily allow styling and layouting with CSS (note that this changes the layout of the public views!)
trans-unit.target: 删除了公共视图中的所有表格,以便更容易地使用CSS进行样式和布局(注意,这将改变公共视图的布局!)。

trans-unit.source: Removed the RSSViewer (replaced by the RSSAggregator).
trans-unit.target: 删除了RSSViewer(由RSSAggregator取代)。

trans-unit.source: Reuse Silva Document code instead of reimplemented it (article and agenda edition).
trans-unit.target: 重新使用席尔瓦文件代码,而不是重新实施它(文章和议程版)。

trans-unit.source: Reworked public templates: removed divs and replaced by p’s with Silva style plus news selectors, indenting, language
trans-unit.target: Reworked public templates: removed divs and replaced by p’s with Silva style plus news selectors, indenting, language

trans-unit.source: Silva News really depends on Silva Document, not just Silva core.
trans-unit.target: 丝路新闻真正依靠的是丝路文档,而不仅仅是丝路核心。

trans-unit.source: SilvaNews 2.4 is compatible with Silva 1.6+ only. For Silva 1.5 compatibility, the SilvaNews 2.3.x series should be used.
trans-unit.target: SilvaNews 2.4仅与Silva 1.6+兼容。若要兼容Silva 1.5,则应使用SilvaNews 2.3.x系列。

trans-unit.source: SilvaNews has popup calendars for start/end datetimes in the SMI
trans-unit.target: SilvaNews在SMI中弹出了开始/结束日期的日历。

trans-unit.source: SilvaNews no longer manages it’s own upgraders. Upgrading SilvaNews is now tied into the core Silva upgrade process.
trans-unit.target: SilvaNews no longer manages it’s own upgraders. Upgrading SilvaNews is now tied into the core Silva upgrade process.

trans-unit.target: 席尔瓦新闻网 0.9

trans-unit.source: SilvaNewsNetwork 2.7.1 (2009/02/11)
SilvaNewsNetwork 2.7.2 (2009/02/12)
SilvaNewsNetwork 2.7.3 (2009/02/19)

SilvaNewsNetwork 2.9b2 (2010/10/27)
SilvaNewsNetwork 3.0 (2013/03/06)
trans-unit.target: SilvaNewsNetwork 3.0 (2013/03/06)

trans-unit.source: SilvaNewsNetwork 3.0.1 (2013/08/26)
trans-unit.target: SilvaNewsNetwork 3.0.1 (2013/08/26)

trans-unit.source: SilvaNewsNetwork 3.0b1 (2011/11/11)
SilvaNewsNetwork 3.0c1 (2012/09/25)
trans-unit.target: SilvaNewsNetwork 3.0c1 (2012/09/25)

trans-unit.source: SilvaNewsNetwork now works on (and depends on!) Silva 1.5.
trans-unit.target: SilvaNewsNetwork现在可以在Silva 1.5上工作(并依赖于!)。

trans-unit.source: Subjects and target audiences now have a title, which allows changing the way they are displayed without having to update stored references to them (so you can now ‘change a subject’ and still have newsviewers display the correct list of items).
trans-unit.target: Subjects and target audiences now have a title, which allows changing the way they are displayed without having to update stored references to them (so you can now ‘change a subject’ and still have newsviewers display the correct list of items).

trans-unit.source: The ‘number of items to display’ field on news viewers used to limit the number of items displayed in the archive, which made certain items not get displayed anymore, this is not fixed.
trans-unit.target: The ‘number of items to display’ field on news viewers used to limit the number of items displayed in the archive, which made certain items not get displayed anymore, this is not fixed.

trans-unit.source: The ‘publish now’ button for news and agenda items was not setting the display date time. The result was that new items would not be found by filters
trans-unit.target: The ‘publish now’ button for news and agenda items was not setting the display date time. The result was that new items would not be found by filters

trans-unit.source: The ‘publish now’ button in the edit tab of news items raised a 404 when clicked, and it wasn’t translated.
trans-unit.target: The ‘publish now’ button in the edit tab of news items raised a 404 when clicked, and it wasn’t translated.

trans-unit.source: The AgendaViewer displays the same number of characters for each item’s intro as NewsViewers do (i.e. 128)
trans-unit.target: The AgendaViewer displays the same number of characters for each item’s intro as NewsViewers do (i.e. 128)

trans-unit.source: The RSS Aggregator now merges/sorts the feeds based on each feed item’s publication date.
trans-unit.target: The RSS Aggregator now merges/sorts the feeds based on each feed item’s publication date.

trans-unit.source: The default INV formulator form and view templates have new features including: containing div id and class, showing a search box, specifying article level, optional image thumbnail, where and whether to place links to articles, and possible a few others. If you’re using the default INV, you should refresh the template by going to the each INV’s url and adding ‘/refresh’, e.g. http://server.com/silva/inv/refresh
trans-unit.target: The default INV formulator form and view templates have new features including: containing div id and class, showing a search box, specifying article level, optional image thumbnail, where and whether to place links to articles, and possible a few others. If you’re using the default INV, you should refresh the template by going to the each INV’s url and adding ‘/refresh’, e.g. http://server.com/silva/inv/refresh

trans-unit.source: The rss.xml feed on news and agenda viewers did not validate against the rss 1.0 specification
trans-unit.target: 新闻和议程浏览者的rss.xml馈送不符合rss 1.0规范。

trans-unit.source: This extension is the equivalent of silva.app.news for Silva 2 and before. It is available on Silva 3 only for migration purposes.
trans-unit.target: This extension is the equivalent of silva.app.news for Silva 2 and before. It is available on Silva 3 only for migration purposes.

trans-unit.source: Update Kupu css with fixes for the Kupu in Firefox edit html problem
trans-unit.target: 更新Kupu css与修复Kupu在Firefox编辑html的问题。

trans-unit.source: Update Silva XML import and export API.
trans-unit.target: 更新Silva XML导入和导出API。

trans-unit.source: Update last author when an article/agenda item is saved in kupu.
trans-unit.target: 当一篇文章/议程项目保存在kupu中时,更新最后一个作者。

trans-unit.source: Update publish controls with new layout. Still to be fixed is the switch from a publish now checkbox to a publish now button
trans-unit.target: 更新发布控件的新布局。仍需修正的是,从立即发布复选框切换到立即发布按钮。

trans-unit.source: Update upgraders for
trans-unit.target: 更新升级器

trans-unit.source: Update upgraders: fix catalog indexes (too many were removed), upgrade agenda viewers settings.
trans-unit.target: 更新升级程序:修复目录索引(删除太多),升级议程查看器设置。

trans-unit.source: Updated SilvaNews to work with Silva 1.2
trans-unit.target: 更新了SilvaNews以配合Silva 1.2的工作。

trans-unit.source: You can find the code of this extension in Git: https://github.com/silvacms/Products.SilvaNews
trans-unit.target: You can find the code of this extension in Git: https://github.com/silvacms/Products.SilvaNews

trans-unit.source: added ‘en’ to i18n to make the fallback work.
trans-unit.target: added ‘en’ to i18n to make the fallback work.

trans-unit.source: added interfaces INewsViewer and IAgendaViewer. These interfaces can be used by SilvaLayout/Five to provide special views for news/agenda viewers.
trans-unit.target: 增加了接口INewsViewer和IAgendaViewer。这些接口可以被SilvaLayout/Five使用,为新闻/日程查看者提供特殊的视图。

trans-unit.source: added the end date/time and location properties of Agenda Items to the agenda item add screen.
trans-unit.target: 在 "议程项目的添加 "页面,添加了 "议程项目的结束日期/时间/地点 "的属性。

trans-unit.source: added the location property of Agenda Items to the public view
trans-unit.target: 在公共视图中添加了议程项目的位置属性。

trans-unit.source: adding a vertical separator between months
trans-unit.target: 在月与月之间添加一个垂直分隔符

trans-unit.source: adding wrappers for the news and agenda archive content area
trans-unit.target: 为新闻和议程归档内容区添加包装纸。

trans-unit.source: certain objects result in an IOError when Silva was running on Windows Zope installations.
trans-unit.target: 当Silva在Windows Zope安装上运行时,某些对象会导致IOError。

trans-unit.source: changed layout more silva-core-like and improved usability cfr issue 1581
trans-unit.target: 改变了布局,使之更像silva-core,并改进了可用性cfr issue 1581。

trans-unit.source: changed the viewer public language back so that translations work.
trans-unit.target: 改回了查看器的公共语言,以便翻译工作。

trans-unit.source: correct localization datetime issues with rssaggregator’s rss/atom feeds and inlineviewer newsprovider.
trans-unit.target: correct localization datetime issues with rssaggregator’s rss/atom feeds and inlineviewer newsprovider.

trans-unit.source: each of the three public views (standard, archive, search) uses a shared macro to render the items, ensuring consistent display between all three views.
trans-unit.target: 三个公共视图(标准、归档、搜索)中的每一个都使用一个共享的宏来渲染项目,确保所有三个视图之间的显示一致。

trans-unit.source: eliminated all calls to getObject() (catalogbrain) in the filters – since it’s a “slow” operation, the cases where this was required are now using the additional catalog metadata columns.
trans-unit.target: eliminated all calls to getObject() (catalogbrain) in the filters – since it’s a “slow” operation, the cases where this was required are now using the additional catalog metadata columns.

trans-unit.source: fix for broken rss feed caused by get_intro() not getting the model
trans-unit.target: 修复了由于get_intro()没有得到模型而导致的rss feed故障。

trans-unit.source: fix in NewsFilter.get_next_items, to catch _all_ agenda item cases
trans-unit.target: 修正NewsFilter.get_next_items中的问题,以捕获所有议程项目的情况。

trans-unit.source: fixed 101299, NoViewError exception when comparing newsitem versions
trans-unit.target: 修正了101299,比较新闻项目版本时出现NoViewError异常。

trans-unit.source: fixed 101577, widgets missing from service_news_sub_viewer
trans-unit.target: 修正了101577,service_news_sub_viewer中缺少小部件。

trans-unit.source: fixed 101616, inline news viewers don’t correct viewer listing
trans-unit.target: fixed 101616, inline news viewers don’t correct viewer listing

trans-unit.source: fixed 101729, Display DT isn’t updated when NewsItems are
trans-unit.target: fixed 101729, Display DT isn’t updated when NewsItems are

trans-unit.source: fixed 101731, NewsItems have “make local” settings tab option
trans-unit.target: fixed 101731, NewsItems have “make local” settings tab option

trans-unit.source: fixed 110570, properties tool not appearing in Kupu
trans-unit.target: 修正了110570,库普中不出现属性工具的问题。

trans-unit.source: fixed 115608, news viewer property titles unclear
trans-unit.target: 修正了115608,新闻浏览者属性标题不清晰的问题。

trans-unit.source: fixed 128591, status tab of News Items broken for authors
trans-unit.target: 修复了128591,新闻项的状态标签对作者来说是坏的。

trans-unit.source: fixed broken external source cfr issue 1434
trans-unit.target: 修正了破损的外部源cfr问题1434

trans-unit.source: fixed bug cfr revision 8871 removed can_approve()
trans-unit.target: 修正了cfr修订版8871的错误 删除了can_approve()

trans-unit.source: fixed display date rendering and setting cfr issue 1601, 1603
trans-unit.target: 修正了显示日期渲染和设置cfr问题1601、1603。

trans-unit.source: fixed imort/export of InlineNewsViewer cfr issue 1600
trans-unit.target: 修正了InlineNewsViewer的导入/导出cfr问题1600。

trans-unit.source: fixed publish now cfr issue 1605
trans-unit.target: 修正了CFR1605问题的即时发布

trans-unit.source: fixed render error when a News viewer has a image and PIL is not installed cfr issue 1604
trans-unit.target: 修正了当新闻查看器有图像且未安装PIL时的渲染错误 cfr问题1604

trans-unit.source: fixed rss icon cfr issue 1506, 1580
trans-unit.target: 修复了rss图标cfr问题1506、1580。

trans-unit.source: in tab_edit you can now see in the preview of a published NewsItem an infobox showing all related info
trans-unit.target: 在tab_edit中,您现在可以在发布的NewsItem的预览中看到一个显示所有相关信息的信息框。

trans-unit.source: in the future
trans-unit.target: 以后

trans-unit.source: more xhtml compliant
trans-unit.target: 更多xhtml兼容

trans-unit.source: news articles show now publication date or display date if set cfr issue 1602
trans-unit.target: 新闻文章显示现在的出版日期或显示日期,如果设置了cfr issue 1602。

trans-unit.source: refactored the viewers, merging shared code
trans-unit.target: 重构了查看器,合并了共享代码。

trans-unit.source: registering content via ‘silva’ zcml directives
trans-unit.target: registering content via ‘silva’ zcml directives

trans-unit.source: removed debugging output on rss aggregator public view, and added additional css classes
trans-unit.target: 删除了rss聚合器公共视图的调试输出,并增加了额外的css类。

trans-unit.source: removed tal:attribute where tal:replace was called.
trans-unit.target: 在调用tal:replace的地方删除tal:属性。

trans-unit.source: removed the SNN 2.6 upgrader (which refreshes the catalog). All news items do need to be reindexed. To do this, use the “Partial catalog rebuilds” tab of the Silva Extensions Service (in the ZMI) to rebuild each Silva News Publication.
trans-unit.target: removed the SNN 2.6 upgrader (which refreshes the catalog). All news items do need to be reindexed. To do this, use the “Partial catalog rebuilds” tab of the Silva Extensions Service (in the ZMI) to rebuild each Silva News Publication.

trans-unit.source: removing ‘<<’ and ‘>>’ from links and putting the the html entities in a span
trans-unit.target: removing ‘<<’ and ‘>>’ from links and putting the the html entities in a span

trans-unit.source: rss aggregator public view: adjusted feed link to be the html link, rather than the uri of the syndication feed
trans-unit.target: rss聚合器公共视图:调整feed链接为html链接,而不是syndication feed的uri。

trans-unit.source: rss.xml and atom.xml also work for RSSAggregator
trans-unit.target: rss.xml和atom.xml也适用于RSSAggregator。

trans-unit.source: silva.app.news
trans-unit.target: silva.app.新闻

trans-unit.source: the rss views now use the get_intro method of the items, instead of the metadata description.
trans-unit.target: rss视图现在使用项目的get_intro方法,而不是元数据描述。

trans-unit.source: to Silva 3.0c1. They can work from Silva 2.1.
trans-unit.target: 到Silva 3.0c1。他们可以从Silva 2.1开始工作。

trans-unit.source: to use new metadata columns
trans-unit.target: 使用新的元数据列

trans-unit.source: uniformed css classes for view and viewer newsitems, un-div-ing
trans-unit.target: 统一的css类,用于查看和浏览新闻项,不分项。

trans-unit.source: using ‘get_intro’ for RSS feeds introduced a bug in at least some RSS feeds. This has been worked around.
trans-unit.target: using ‘get_intro’ for RSS feeds introduced a bug in at least some RSS feeds. This has been worked around.

trans-unit.source: viewers displayed items in reverse order when using multiple filters
trans-unit.target: 当使用多个过滤器时,浏览者以相反的顺序显示项目。

trans-unit.source: worked up SilvaNews interfaces a bit
trans-unit.target: 研究了一下SilvaNews的接口

trans-unit.source: working with Zope 2.10 (ala merge 2.4-zope-2.10-branch)
trans-unit.target: 与Zope 2.10一起工作(la merge 2.4-zope-2.10-branch)。
